analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasekkhaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sekkho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na sekkham na kusalam dhammam paccayā sekkhaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe avigate cha

original: Nasekkhaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sekkham na akusalam dhammam paccayā nevasekkha na asekkhaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasekkhaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na sekkham na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca nevasekkha na asekkhaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe avigate pañca
